summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane road. The traffic is moderate, with several vehicles visible ahead. The brown SUV in front of the self-driving vehicle is moving from the left lane to the center lane, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates rapidly due to the brown SUV cutting into its lane from the left lane. The vehicles speed decreases significantly over the last few seconds, maintaining a close distance to the brown SUV ahead.
key_objects: 1) Front: A brown SUV, approximately 2 meters away, moving from the left lane to the center lane, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate rapidly. 2) Left: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining its lane. 3) Right: A white van, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining its lane.
